entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.7°C

Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
